Name: Unit of Amount of Substance
Description: A unit of amount of substance is a measure of the number of some specified elementary entities (usually either atoms, or molecules, or ions, or electrons) present in the sample, but where this number is expressed in terms of some standard batch size.

Properties.Description: Abbreviated text representations for this unit

Properties.Name: Canonical abbreviation
Properties.Description: Globally recognised abbreviated text representation for this unit.

Properties.Name: Measurement System
Properties.Description: The measurement system this unit belongs to

Properties.Description: The dimension measured by this unit

Properties.Description: Conversion formula to the System International base unit
